Episodes.Title: Work Hard or Die Trying, Girl
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Nora Smith
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Gene tries to make one of his dreams a reality when he gets the opportunity to make a musical version of Die Hard at the Wagstaff Fall Festival.

Episodes.Title: Tina and the Real Ghost
Episodes.Director: Boo Hwan Lim, Kyoung Hee Lim, Bernard Derriman
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Steven Davis
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina begins an out-of-this-world romance with a ghost that is believed to be living in the Belcher's basement.

Episodes.Title: Friends with Burger-fits
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Dan Fybel
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob becomes Teddy's workout buddy after finding out his burgers contributed to Teddy's bad health. The two enroll in a stuntman boot camp where their friendship is put to the test. Meanwhile, the kids make an ice rink in the freez...

Episodes.Title: Dawn of the Peck
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Lizzie Molyneux-Logelin
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: While Bob is boycotting the holiday, Linda and the kids spend Thanksgiving at the First Annual Fischoeder Turk-tacular Turkey Town Festival. However, a wild bird attack leads to total mayhem.

Episodes.Title: Best Burger
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Mike Benner
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob is in a "best burger" competition, but is at risk of losing when an important part of the burger is nowhere to be found.

Episodes.Title: Father of the Bob
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Steven Davis
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: At Bob's father's Christmas party, Bob and "Big Bob" rehash an old argument and try to outdo each other in the kitchen. Meanwhile, the kids compete to find the best gift for their dad.

Episodes.Title: Tina Tailor Soldier Spy
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Holly Schlesinger
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: After being pestered by the kids and a mistake by Gretchen, Linda decides to dye her hair full blonde. Meanwhile, when trying to quit the Thunder Girls Tina is asked to find a mole in the troop.

Episodes.Title: Midday Run
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Scott Jacobson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina gets Gene and Louise to help ensure she gets a big hall-monitor promotion.

Episodes.Title: Speakeasy Rider
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Rich Rinaldi
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina, Gene and Louise are ready to put the pedal to the metal when they join a go-kart league. Meanwhile, at the restaurant Bob and Teddy partner up to serve Teddy's home-brewed beer.

Episodes.Title: Late Afternoon in the Garden of Bob and Louise
Episodes.Director: Boo Hwan Lim, Kyoung Hee Lim, Bernard Derriman
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Jon Schroeder
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: In order to become a member of the community garden, Bob must give Louise's enemy a job.

Episodes.Title: Can't Buy Me Math
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Dan Fybel
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina and Darryl team up to win the Cupid's Couple contest; Linda plans Valentine's Day activities.

Episodes.Title: The Millie-churian Candiate
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Gregory Thompson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Desperate to keep Millie from becoming class president and ruining the school, Tina and Louise volunteer to help run Jimmy Junior's campaign.

Episodes.Title: The Gayle Tales
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Lizzie Molyneux-Logelin
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: The kids compete to be their Aunt Gayle's companion for the evening.

Episodes.Title: L'il Hard Dad
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Nora Smith
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob becomes obsessed with his new automatic helicopter. When it falls apart for no reason, he enters into a battle with the manufacturer in order to receive a refund. Gene assists Bob in his quest, but things quickly get out of ha...

Episodes.Title: Adventures in Chinchilla-sitting
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Mike Benner
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob and Linda head out on the town for a date - but to Linda's dismay, Bob's idea of romance proves "trivial." Meanwhile, a wild chinchilla chase ensues after the school pet that Louis was charged with watching escapes out the fro...

Episodes.Title: The Runway Club
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Steven Davis
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: The kids try to escape Saturday detention so they can attend the Cotton Candy Festival.

Episodes.Title: Itty Bitty Ditty Committee
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Holly Schlesinger
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Gene is promptly kicked out of the band he formed with Tina, Louise, Rudy, Peter, and Daryl, and proclaims he is never going to play keyboard again.

Episodes.Title: Eat, Spray, Linda
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Jon Schroeder
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: It's Linda's birthday and Bob needs more time to plan her birthday surprise. But when he sends her out of the house as a distraction, she goes missing. Mayhem ensues as the Belchers must work together to find Linda.

Episodes.Title: Housetrap
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Dan Fybel
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: When a vicious storm strikes during the Belcher family's vacation at a beach house in Craggy Neck, they find themselves staying with the mysterious owner.

Episodes.Title: Hawk & Chick
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Rich Rinaldi
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob and Louise are thrilled when they meet Hawk, the star of their favorite martial arts series, and are quick to offer help upon learning about his family troubles.

Episodes.Title: The Oeder Games
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Scott Jacobson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: With the threat of a rent increase on Ocean Avenue, Bob and the other tenants rebel. After approaching Fischoeder, the tenants find out that they will have to compete in order to convince him to keep their rents reasonable.
